markdownRemark.html:
After the draw, all participants receive an email to find out who their secret friend is. In the body of the email, there's a red button that says "Find out who you got," you need to click on that button.
Then, a new page will open, you click where it says "See who I got." Soon after, a box with the name of your secret friend will be displayed.

If you haven't received any emails, check your SPAM box or ask the group organizer to resend it to you within the app.

Did we help you? If you still have questions, just get in touch. We are always available!

Happy Secret Santa!

frontmatter.title: HOW TO FIND OUT WHO YOUR FRIEND IS
